text:
Storage Browser for Amazon S3 is an open- 
source component you can add to your web

applications to provide your end users with an 
intuitive visual interface to access data stored

in S3. With Storage Browser for S3 authorized 
end users can easily browse, download, upload,

copy, and delete data in S3 directly from your 
applications. You can control access to your

data based on your end users' identities using AWS 
security and identity services or your own managed

services, and you can also customize the interface 
to match your existing application's design and

branding. Storage Browser for S3 automatically 
enhances uploads for high-throughput data

transfer, optimizes performance for faster load 
times, and calculates checksums of the data your

users upload, accepting objects after confirming 
that data integrity was maintained in transit

over the public internet. Storage Browser for S3 
makes it easier for your web developers to bring

your data closer to your users and empowers your 
customers, partners, and employees by providing a

secure and seamless experience for working 
with data in S3. Use Storage Browser for S3

to increase productivity for your users and 
to remove undifferentiated heavy lifting from

your developers so they can focus on the core 
features of your applications. Storage Browser for

S3 is available in the AWS Amplify JavaScript 
and React client libraries. Get started today!
